Title: Bid to conserve water, NF Railway installs first-ever Automatic Coach Washing Plant in Guwahat
Narrative:
Guwahati: In a big step towards the commitment of water conservation, the Northeast Frontier Railway has installed its first-ever Smart Automatic Coach Washing Plant (ACWP) at Kamakhya Coach Maintenance Depot in Guwahati.

https://nenow.in/north-east-news/assam/bid-to-conserve-water-nf-railway-installs-first-ever-automatic-coach-washing-plant-in-guwahati.html
